messages.help: DA Severe Weather Alerting System (DASWAS). V0.7 - COMMANDS: !wx-update - Updates the system's alert catalog || !wx-all - gets all severe alerts. (currently disabled) || !wx-state xx - gets severe alerts for a specific state. || !wx-mstate xx - gets MODERATE alerts for a specific state. || !wx-zip xxxxx - gets all alerts for a zip code || !wx-nhc - gets latest atlantic nhc alert.
